lines.gurmukhi: bwlk iksor jobnwid Aau jrw ibvsQw eyk hI jnm hoq Aink pRkwr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Baalak Kisor Jobanaadi Au Jaraa Bivasadaa , Ayk Hee Janam Hot Anik Prakaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as one go through childhood, adolescence, youth and old age in one lifespan.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy inis idin iqiQ vwr pC mwsu ruiq cqur mwsw qiRibiD brK ibQwr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Nisi Dini Tidi Vaar Pachh Maasu Routi , Chatur Maasaa Tribidhi Barakh Bidaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As days, nights, dates, weeks, months, four seasons are the spread of one year;

lines.gurmukhi: jwgq supn Aau sKopiq AvsQw kY qurIAw pRgws gur igAwn aupkwr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaagat Soupan Au Sakhopati Avasadaa Kai , Tureeaa Pragaas Gur Giaan Oupakaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As wakefulness, dream sleep, deep slumber and a state of nothingness (Turi) are different states;

lines.gurmukhi: mwns jnm swDsMg imil swD sMq Bgq ibbykI jn bHm bIcwr hY ]159]
lines.transliteration_english: Maanas Janam Saadhasang Mili Saadh Santa , Bhagat Bibaykee Jan Braham Beechaar Hai ?159?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly meeting with saintly people and contemplating on Lord's glory and grandeur during human life, one becomes a godly person, a saint, a devotee and a wise man. (159)
